method.name: get_help_string
method.description: Returns the [ArgumentOption]'s help string formatted for printing. If [param is_rich] is [code]true[/code] then the string will include BBCode color formatting.

method.name: has_alias
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [param alias] is in [member aliases].

members.member: The alternative names the option can be known by.
The default value the option returns if not set.

The suffix arguments of the option following its name. If an argument contains "[lb]" and "[rb]", [method ArgumentOption.get_help_string]'s rich text formatting will give it a cyan BBCode color tag for the argument. If an argument contains "<" and ">", [method ArgumentOption.get_help_string]'s rich text formatting will give it a magenta BBCode color tag for the argument.
